name: Rein In Reindeer
description:
Santa's reindeer have escaped, catch them so Santa can deliver his presents.

You are equipped with a gas powered tranquilizer ('R' to load a dart, 'F' to refuel).

UI

Some parts of the UI will disappear when not being actively used, to reveal them again for a few seconds, simply click T, F, R or scroll your mouse wheel.

Controls ReloadRRefuelFTorchTJumpSpaceFireMouse 0ADSMouse 1Increase Move SpeedScroll UpDecrease Move SpeedScroll DownOpen/Close MenuEscape Credits

Unity UI Extensions
https://bitbucket.org/UnityUIExtensions/unity-ui-extensions/

Digitalt Font
https://www.fontspace.com/gluk/digitalt

Cursor
http://www.iconarchive.com/show/windows-8-icons-by-icons8/Very-Basic-Cursor-icon...

Blizzard SFX
https://www.zapsplat.com/music/blizzard-snow-ambience/

Notes

Currently in order to restart/replay, you'll have to relaunch the game.

Nothing happens once you've finished capturing all the reindeer.
